system.description: When you frighten, intimidate, or cow others with your monstrous form, roll + Freak.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: They react with violence, hatred, and paranoia, and you suffer the brunt of it.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value:
They are thrown off and make themselves vulnerable to you, or they flee. Choose two.

  • you frighten others you had not intended to scare
  • you hurt someone or break something you shouldn’t have
  • you feel like more of a monster afterward; mark a condition (GM’s choice)

success.label: Success!
success.value:
They are thrown off and make themselves vulnerable to you, or they flee. Choose one.

  • you frighten others you had not intended to scare
  • you hurt someone or break something you shouldn’t have
  • you feel like more of a monster afterward; mark a condition (GM’s choice)

system.choices:
• You frighten others you had not intended to scare
  • You hurt someone or break something you shouldn’t have
  • You feel like more of a monster afterward; mark a condition (GM’s choice)
